execution_plan.description: Aggregate post counts per username from the app database (posts -> users).
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.username AS s1__username, COUNT(posts.id) AS s1__posts_count FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.id GROUP BY users.username;

execution_plan.description: Aggregate message counts per username from the app_chat database (messages -> users).
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.username AS s2__username, COUNT(messages.id) AS s2__messages_count FROM messages JOIN users ON messages.sended_by = users.id GROUP BY users.username;

execution_plan.description: Combine post and message aggregates by username (full outer join on username) and compute total activity, ordering by total activity descending.
execution_plan.query: SELECT COALESCE(s1.s1__username, s2.s2__username) AS s3__username, COALESCE(s1.s1__posts_count, 0) + COALESCE(s2.s2__messages_count, 0) AS s3__total_activity FROM (SELECT $step1.s1__username AS s1__username, $step1.s1__posts_count AS s1__posts_count) AS s1 FULL JOIN (SELECT $step2.s2__username AS s2__username, $step2.s2__messages_count AS s2__messages_count) AS s2 ON s1.s1__username = s2.s2__username ORDER BY s3__total_activity DESC;
